item.title: Goldman Sachs CEO: AI’s opportunity is enormous, but ‘there will be winners and losers’
item.description: David Solomon sees artificial intelligence as a major catalyst for U.S. economic growth—but warns that the path ahead won’t be a straight line.

item.title: AI empowers criminals to launch ‘customized attacks at scale’—but could also help firms fortify their defenses, say tech industry leaders

item.description: Remote work remains highly popular and shows unexpected benefits for workers who face challenges in conventional workplaces.

item.title: The bloodbath in stocks was ‘the end of the cutting season,’ BofA says: Now we’re on alert for the ‘fail risks’ of 2025
